DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate various ocular parameter necessary ocular biometry calculate IOL power use dual Schiempflug analyzer optical low-coherence refelctometry .
DOC.brief_title: IOL Power Calculation Using Dual Schiempflug Analyzer
DOC.detailed_description: The measured keratometry , axial length , anterior chamber depth , lens thickness , white-to-white corneal diameter , calculate IOL power use various formula include Hoffer Q , Holladay I , SRK II SRK T measure dual Schiempflug analyzer optical low-coherence refelctometry compare .
DOC.criteria: axial length 21.0 27.0 mm old 20 year old ophthalmic disease severe dry eye , glaucoma , agerelated macular degeneration previous ophthalmic surgery include cataract surgery , refractive surgery dense medium measure optical biometry severe zonulysis
